wikipedia_page.main: Jane Lovering is a British writer of romance novels since 2008. In 2012, her novel Please Don't Stop the Music won the Romantic Novel of the Year Award by the Romantic Novelists' Association. In 2018, her book, Christmas at the Little Village School, won Love Story of the Year at the Romantic Novelists' Association awards.

response: *     2012: Please Don't Stop The Music by Jane Lovering (Choc Lit)
*     2018: Christmas at the Little Village School by Jane Lovering (Choc Lit)
*     2012: Please Don't Stop The Music by Jane Lovering (Choc Lit)
